channel.title: Unable to put cape back on?

item.title: Unable to put cape back on?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

ok i made this

case 4031: // shantay pass if(playerEquipment[playerCape] == 1007) {// cape teleportToX = 3304; teleportToY = 3116; sendMessage("You teleport to the desert!"); } else sendMessage("You need to equip a red cape!"); break;

but how do i make it so they cannot put the cape back on only when they are inside the desertâ€¦?
